Package elki.gui.minigui

Class MiniGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • elki.application.AbstractApplication
      • elki.gui.minigui.MiniGUI
  • @Alias({"mini","minigui"})
public class MiniGUI
extends AbstractApplication
    Minimal GUI built around a table-based parameter editor.
    Since:
    0.3
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
